title: Trying to reconnect...

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Hi.
When I try to log into my account, it takes unusually long time to authenticate and when done, I get this window. My internet connection is ok (1000/1000Mbps) , I am connected via ethernet... Full repair didnÂ´t work. I managed to log in with another account, but almost all "profile icons" from friend list were blank, loot had blue icons... Any way to fix it pls?

replies.body: getting the same issues!! never have this problem

Even with a solid connection you can have issues getting blocked from the game server, so a reinstall might not work in this case.  Instead, the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help clear this up.  This should help getting back into game and render assets with your profile, chat, and hextech.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5VE5lWxd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-20T17:22:35.394+0000)
>
> Even with a solid connection you can have issues getting blocked from the game server, so a reinstall might not work in this case.  Instead, the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help clear this up.  This should help getting back into game and render assets with your profile, chat, and hextech.

Ran into the same issue just now as described above. This morning I could play just fine, and now it gives either the screen as shown above, or it doesn't authenticate at all. 
I ran the HRT, 
reset the modem
rebooted my computer
Haven't changed any settings since this morning, and windows didn't update between then and now. Firewall exceptions are up for LoL.
Still the same, LoL tries to log in forever and then fails.
